prompt.content: What is the % change in EBITDA Margin from Q3 to Q4 rounded to 2 decimals for KLA Corporation (KLAC on Nasdaq) in FY 2024. Use the company filings 10-Q. Format your answer in % to 2 decimal places.

messages.content: [{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"Uses KLA 10-Q filings for FY2024 Q3 (March 31, 2024), Q4 (June 30, 2024) and Q2 (ending December 31, 2023) as sources"},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"Net income for FY2024 Q3 = 601,541"},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"FY2024 Q3 Provision for income taxes = 100,467"},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"FY2024 Q3 Interest expense = 79,981"},{"criteria":"FY2024 Q3 Total Revenue = 2,359,830","operator":"correctness"},{"criteria":"Depreciation and amortization (Nine months ended March 31, 2024) = 300,729","operator":"correctness"},{"criteria":"Depreciation and amortization (Six months ended December 31, 2023) = 201,466","operator":"correctness"},{"criteria":"Depreciation and amortization (Three months ended March 31, 2024) calculated = Depreciation and amortization (Nine months ended March 31, 2024) 300,729 - Depreciation and amortization (Six months ended December 31, 2023) 201,466 = 99,263","operator":"correctness"},{"criteria":"FY2024 Q4 Net income = 836,446","operator":"correctness"},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"FY2024 Q4 Provision for income taxes = 108,597"},{"criteria":"FY2024 Q4 Interest expense = 82,836","operator":"correctness"},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"FY2024 Q4 Depreciation & Amortization = 101,001"},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"FY2024 Q4 Total Revenue = 2,568,735"},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"EBITDA formula used: EBITDA = Net Income + Income Tax Expense + Interest Expense + Depreciation & Amortization"},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"EBITDA margin formula used: EBITDA Margin = (EBITDA / Total Revenue) x 100"},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"Percentage change formula used: ((Q4 EBITDA Margin - Q3 EBITDA Margin) / Q3 EBITDA Margin) x 100"},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"FY2024 Q3 EBITDA calculated = 881,252"},{"criteria":"FY2024 Q3 EBITDA margin calculated = 37.3439%","operator":"correctness"},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"FY2024 Q4 EBITDA calculated = 1,128,880"},{"criteria":"FY2024 Q4 EBITDA margin calculated = 43.94692%","operator":"correctness"},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"Percentage change between Q4 and Q3 calculated =(43.94692- 37.3439)/37.3439) X 100= 17.68166%"},{"criteria":"percentage change rounded to 2 decimal places and reported = 17.68%","operator":"correctness"}]
